title: Issues in Philosophical Logic
description:
This module will explore in depth some advanced topics in philosophical logic. Possible topics include extensions to classical logic, such as modal logics and
higher order logics, non?classical logics, such as intuitionistic, many?valued and relevant logics, or philosophical questions about logic.
prerequisite: Completed 80MCs, including 28 MCs in PH, with a minimum CAP of 3.20 or be on the Honours track. PH2110/GEM2006
